name: MtWashingtonObservatoryHigherSummitsForecast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill will play the latest audio weather forecast recording from Mount Washington Observatory for the White Mountain National Forest area and Presidential Range of New Hampshire. MP3 and Text based forecasts can be found at https://www.mountwashington.org/experience-the-weather/higher-summit-forecast.aspx
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
